scenario.name: register
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[field2] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [field5]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field1]@[field2]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field0]@[field2]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER Contact: sip:[field0]@[field5]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 10 Expires: 3000 Content-Length: 0 Path: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port];lr> X-NAT: Yes
